price: Ampa sε Yεde nimdeε yii (Israel mma) no maa wͻkyεn amansan no nyinaa (wͻ Mose berε so)
arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqadi ikh'tarnāhum ʿalā ʿil'min ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
